subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Re: May this not be kicking a dead horse...
msgSnippet: From: brent.r.langille@dal.ca ... I believe it s already been decided to add the Quikscript characters into the Unicode space used by Shavian (which is in
messageBody:
From: brent.r.langille@...
>
> I have been using quikscript for approximately one year.
> In that time it has become indispensible to me in the area
> of handwritting. I would like to be able to use quikscript
> when typing as well.
> . . .
>
> I have no particular expertise with unicode or the
> procedures but i am willing to volunteer in any way i
> can to help prepare the submission to the deciding body.


I believe it's already been decided to add the Quikscript
characters into the Unicode space used by Shavian
(which is in Plane 1 of Unicode). Shavian code points here:

http://www.unicode.org/charts/PDF/U10450.pdf

--Ph. D.
